Posts.Content: HazelFrances wrote: ugh. Noticed a wet spot on my clothing over the neulasta thing on my stomach. Tape slightly damp on one side, dry on the other side. There's no way to know for sure if I got a full dose, partial dose, or none. As of now the plan is to check my white cells on 10/5, week after chemo. I just hope I can get my next chemo as planned on 10/12. I am so hoping to stay on schedule so I can be in good shape when my mom visits. Log in to post a reply
